vlive.korean: 증거 있나? Is there evidence? 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 투 머치 토커 아이유
진짜라니까 증거, 증거 어떻게 찾냐? I mean it seriously. Evidence? How can I find evidence? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 혀니비니🐖🐇🦡
vlive.english: I mean it seriously. Evidence? How can I find evidence?

vlive.korean: 왜 증거 하나 없는 다른 사람 말에 흔들려? Why are you letting them shake you when they don't even have any evidence? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 친구 남친 바람 말한다 VS 모른척 한다 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.06
vlive.english: Why are you letting them shake you when they don't even have any evidence?

vlive.korean: [땀 삐질] [증거 확실] - 너밖에 없었어 나한테 붙일 사람 - 어? [Sweating] [Sure] - You attach stickers to me. - What? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.88
vlive.english: [Sweating] [Sure] - You attach stickers to me. - What?

vlive.korean: 시작하기 전에 내가 왕다람쥐다라는 증거를 먼저 보여주셔야 합니다 - 증거요? Before you start, please show an evidence that you're a big squirrel. - Evidence? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#405. 아기태양신 (스페셜 DJ 위너 강승윤 with 이진혁)
vlive.english: Before you start, please show an evidence that you're a big squirrel. - Evidence?

examples.korean: There was not a solitary shred of evidence. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 증거라고는 단 하나도 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There was not a solitary shred of evidence. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The evidence against him is pretty flimsy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그에 대한 증거는 좀 설득력이 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The evidence against him is pretty flimsy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We will sift every scrap of evidence. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 단 한 조각의 증거도 면밀히 조사할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We will sift every scrap of evidence. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She supports her theory with copious evidence. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 방대한 증거로 자기 이론을 뒷받침했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She supports her theory with copious evidence. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We have abundant evidence to prove his guilt. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리에겐 그의 유죄를 입증할 증거가 풍부하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We have abundant evidence to prove his guilt. Add to Wordbook
